description: Residents who pay for a Covid-19 test, which comes back negative, will be allowed to leave isolation early.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man to allow seven-day self-isolation
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man to allow seven-day self-isolation - BBC News
maintext: Under the changes, any returning residents would be able to arrange a test on what would be their seventh day of self-isolation, with results being made available the following day.
